sqlMap.update:
UPDATE PARTNER_CONTRACT_ATTACH
STATE=#state# STATE_TIME=#stateTime#
CONTRACT_ID=#contractId# CONTRACT_ATTACH_ID=#contractAttachId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT CONTRACT_ID contractId,CONTRACT_ATTACH_ID contractAttachId,ATTACH_TYPE attachType,S_FILE_ID sFileId,STATE state,STATE_TIME stateTime,CREATE_TIME createTime,S_FILE_NAME sFileName,S_FILE_URL sFileUrl FROM PARTNER_CONTRACT_ATTACH WHERE STATE = '10'
CONTRACT_ID=#contractId# ATTACH_TYPE=#attachType# CONTRACT_ATTACH_ID=#contractAttachId#
